name: Magic 8 Ball - Future Predictor
description: Predict your future with this HTML based magic 8 ball, ask it any question and it will give you the answer. Will you be famous? Will you be rich, or will you enter royalty? Who knows! But this game may decide those questions for you, this game is fun and entertaining for the whole family. Are the answers correct? Maybe they are, Maybe they are not. You'll just have to find out. Expect updates soon including, different game modes and responses.
